alert.note: Alert for Adams; Juneau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 15 at 10:06PM CST until December 15 at 10:45PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CST FOR JUNEAU AND ADAMS COUNTIES... At 1005 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles north of Wisconsin Rapids to near Reedsburg, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mauston, Friendship, New Lisbon, Adams, Necedah, Dellwood, New Rome, Lemonweir, Strongs Prairie, Big Flats, Lindina, Lyndon Station, Kelly, Castle Rock, Colburn, and Finley. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for central Wisconsin. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
